quotes.quote: Christ is the clue to all that is.
Christ has not only spoken to us by his life but has also spoken for us by his death.
Christ has made of death a narrow starlit strip between the companionships of yesterday and the reunions of tomorrow.
Christ is glorified in you when he is more precious to you than all that life can give or death can take.
Jesus Christ, the condescension of divinity, and the exaltation of humanity.
Christ took our hell so that we might take His heaven.
Jesus Christ turns life right-side-up, and heaven outside-in.
Christ has no velvet crosses.
Without Christ there is no hope.
Christ, because of who He is, can look death in the face.
If you believe in an unseen Christ, you will believe in the unseen Christlike potential of others.
If Christ is not divine, every impulse of the Christian world falls to a lower octave, and light and love and hope decline.
To pretend to trust Christ to save you from sin while you are still determined to continue in it is making a mockery of Christ.
Jesus Christ accomplished everything that God the Father started at the creation, and that includes total health.
When Christ was born, so was our hope.
Jesus Christ was God's revenue officer.
Christ's humanity occasions our divinity.
Jesus Christ is the Father of Fatherless.
Christ is worth all, or he is worth nothing.
Christ became one of us to redeem all of us.
Christ not only died for all: He died for each.
Christ is the prince of Reformers and Radicals.
Christ is born into the world through each of us.
Without Christ, not one step; with Him, anywhere!
The name of Christ excludes all merit of our own.
Christ came to take away our sins, not our minds.
The Life of Christ determines everything about us.
The life of Christ was a life of humble simplicity, yet how infinitely exalted was his mission. Christ is our example in all things.
He who has Christ has all he needs and needs no more.
Christ is never fully valued, until sin is clearly seen. We must know the depth and malignity of our disease, in order to appreciate the great Physician.
Christ is the master; the Scriptures are only the servant.
Christ is our temple, in whom by faith all believers meet.
Jesus Christ was an extremist for love, truth and goodness.
Christ is not valued at all, unless he is valued above all.
Jesus Christ is our spring board to promotion and prosperity.
Christ alone makes possible everything you are as a Christian.
Christ wants us to have a child's heart but a grown-up's head.
Christ's blood is the great sovereign remedy for sin-sick souls.
Christ did not die to give people a career but to save the lost.
Christ died for the truth.
Christ rises above all things.
Christ used death to destroy death.
Jesus Christ had a sense of destiny.
Christ moves along the pots and pans.
Christ is the Lesson as well as the Teacher.
Jesus Christ is the only God who has a date in history.
Jesus Christ is not just 'my personal Savior'. He is Lord.
